title: Top health and meditation apps by revenue 2023 | Statista
author: L Ceci; Jun
description: In May 2023, meditation app Calm was the highest-grossing health-related app worldwide, with in-app revenues of over six million U.S.
cleaned_text: Most popular health and meditation apps worldwide 2023, by revenue [In May 2023, meditation app Calm was the highest-grossing health-related app worldwide, with in-app revenues of over six million U.S. dollars in the examined period. Headspace ranked second, with approximately 3.77 million U.S. dollars in revenues. Both Calm and Headspace offers a limited free trial period before redirecting users towards its subscription options. The Canadian-based BetterSleep ranked third, generating almost one million U.S. dollars of in-app revenues in
